item.title: CVE-2023-6362 | A vulnerability has been discovered in Winhex affecting version 16.1 SR-1 and 20.4. This vulnerability consists of a buffer overflow control...
item.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in Winhex affecting version 16.1 SR-1 and 20.4. This vulnerability consists of a buffer overflow controlling the Structured Exception Handler (SEH) registers. This could allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long filename argument.

item.title: CVE-2024-45933 | OnlineNewsSite v1.0 is vulnerable to Cross Site Scripting (XSS) which allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via the Title and summary f...
item.description: OnlineNewsSite v1.0 is vulnerable to Cross Site Scripting (XSS) which allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via the Title and summary fields in the /admin/post/edit/ endpoint.

item.title: CVE-2024-9569 | D-Link DIR-619L B1 formEasySetPassword buffer overflow
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in D-Link DIR-619L B1 2.06 and classified as critical. Affected by this vulnerability is the function formEasySetPassword of the file /goform/formEasySetPassword. The manipulation of the argument curTime leads to buffer overflow. The attack can be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.

item.title: CVE-2024-9574 | SQL Injection vulnerability in SOPlanning
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in SOPlanning <1.45, via /soplanning/www/user_groupes.php in the by parameter, which could allow a remote user to submit a specially crafted query, allowing an attacker to retrieve all the information stored in the DB.

item.title: CVE-2024-9571 | Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in SOPlanning
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SOPlanning <1.45, due to lack of proper validation of user input via /soplanning/www/process/xajax_server.php, affecting multiple parameters. This could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted query to an authenticated user and partially take control of their browser session.

item.title: CVE-2024-9572 | Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in SOPlanning
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SOPlanning <1.45, due to lack of proper validation of user input via /soplanning/www/process/groupe_save.php, in the groupe_id parameter. This could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted query to an authenticated user and steal their session details.

item.title: CVE-2024-9573 | SQL Injection vulnerability in SOPlanning
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in SOPlanning <1.45, through /soplanning/www/groupe_list.php, in the by parameter, which could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted query and extract all the information stored on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-9568 | D-Link DIR-619L B1 formAdvNetwork buffer overflow
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in D-Link DIR-619L B1 2.06. Affected is the function formAdvNetwork of the file /goform/formAdvNetwork. The manipulation of the argument curTime leads to buffer overflow. It is possible to launch the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.

item.title: CVE-2024-9576 | Improper access control in Linux Workbooth Distro
item.description: Vulnerability in Distro Linux Workbooth v2.5 that allows to escalate privileges to the root user by manipulating the network configuration script.

item.title: CVE-2024-9567 | D-Link DIR-619L B1 formAdvFirewall buffer overflow
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found in D-Link DIR-619L B1 2.06. This issue affects the function formAdvFirewall of the file /goform/formAdvFirewall. The manipulation of the argument curTime leads to buffer overflow. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.

item.title: CVE-2024-21455 | Untrusted Pointer Dereference in DSP Service
item.description: Memory corruption when a compat IOCTL call is followed by another IOCTL call from userspace to a driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-23369 | Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer in HLOS
item.description: Memory corruption when invalid length is provided from HLOS for FRS/UDS request/response buffers.

item.title: CVE-2024-23370 | Use After Free in Automotive Multimedia
item.description: Memory corruption when a process invokes IOCTL calls from user-space to create a HAB virtual channel and another process invokes IOCTL calls to destroy the same.

item.title: CVE-2024-23374 | Stack-based Buffer Overflow in Power Management IC
item.description: Memory corruption is possible when an attempt is made from userspace or console to write some haptics effects pattern to the haptics debugfs file.

item.title: CVE-2024-23375 | Buffer Copy Without Checking Size of Input (`Classic Buffer Overflow`) in RIL
item.description: Memory corruption during the network scan request.

item.title: CVE-2024-23376 | Use After Free in ComputerVision
item.description: Memory corruption while sending the persist buffer command packet from the user-space to the kernel space through the IOCTL call.

item.title: CVE-2024-23378 | Buffer Copy Without Checking Size of Input (`Classic Buffer Overflow`) in Audio
item.description: Memory corruption while invoking IOCTL calls for MSM module from the user space during audio playback and record.

item.title: CVE-2024-23379 | Double Free in DSP Services
item.description: Memory corruption while unmapping the fastrpc map when two threads can free the same map in concurrent scenario.

item.title: CVE-2024-33049 | Buffer Over-read in WLAN Host Communication
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing noninheritance IE of Extension element when length of IE is 2 of beacon frame.

item.title: CVE-2024-33064 | Buffer Over-read in WLAN Host Communication
item.description: Information disclosure while parsing the multiple MBSSID IEs from the beacon.

item.title: CVE-2024-33065 | Improper Input Validation in Camera
item.description: Memory corruption while taking snapshot when an offset variable is set by camera driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-33066 | Improper Input Validation in WLAN Resource Manager
item.description: Memory corruption while redirecting log file to any file location with any file name.

item.title: CVE-2024-33069 | Use After Free in WLAN Host
item.description: Transient DOS when transmission of management frame sent by host is not successful and error status is received in the host.

item.title: CVE-2024-33070 | Buffer Over-read in WLAN Host Communication
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing ESP IE from beacon/probe response frame.

item.title: CVE-2024-33071 | Buffer Over-read in WLAN Host Communication
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing the MBSSID IE from the beacons when IE length is 0.

item.title: CVE-2024-33073 | Buffer Over-read in WLAN Host Communication
item.description: Information disclosure while parsing the BSS parameter change count or MLD capabilities fields of the ML IE.

item.title: CVE-2024-38397 | Buffer Over-read in WLAN Host Communication
item.description: Transient DOS while parsing probe response and assoc response frame.

item.title: CVE-2024-38399 | Use After Free in Graphics
item.description: Memory corruption while processing user packets to generate page faults.

item.title: CVE-2024-38425 | Improper Authorization in Performance
item.description: Information disclosure while sending implicit broadcast containing APP launch information.

item.title: CVE-2024-43047 | Use After Free in DSP Service
item.description: Memory corruption while maintaining memory maps of HLOS memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-9566 | D-Link DIR-619L B1 formDeviceReboot buffer overflow
item.description: A vulnerability classified as critical was found in D-Link DIR-619L B1 2.06. This vulnerability affects the function formDeviceReboot of the file /goform/formDeviceReboot. The manipulation of the argument next_page leads to buffer overflow. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.

item.title: CVE-2024-42027 | The E2EE password entropy generated by Rocket.Chat Mobile prior to version 4.5.1 is insufficient, allowing attackers to crack it if they hav...
item.description: The E2EE password entropy generated by Rocket.Chat Mobile prior to version 4.5.1 is insufficient, allowing attackers to crack it if they have the appropriate time and resources.

item.title: CVE-2024-46325 | TP-Link WR740N V6 has a stack overflow vulnerability via the ssid parameter in /userRpm/popupSiteSurveyRpm.htm url.
item.description: TP-Link WR740N V6 has a stack overflow vulnerability via the ssid parameter in /userRpm/popupSiteSurveyRpm.htm url.

item.title: CVE-2024-45153 | Adobe Experience Manager | Cross-site Scripting (Stored XSS) (CWE-79)
item.description: Adobe Experience Manager versions 6.5.20 and earlier are affected by a stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability that could be abused by a low-privileged attacker to inject malicious scripts into vulnerable form fields. Malicious JavaScript may be executed in a victim’s browser when they browse to the page containing the vulnerable field.

item.title: CVE-2024-47344 | WordPress uListing plugin <= 2.1.5 - Sensitive Data Exposure vulnerability
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in StylemixThemes uListing.This issue affects uListing: from n/a through 2.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-47335 | WordPress Bit Form plugin <= 2.13.11 - SQL Injection vulnerability
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Bit Form Bit Form – Contact Form Plugin allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Bit Form – Contact Form Plugin: from n/a through 2.13.11.

item.title: CVE-2024-9565 | D-Link DIR-605L formSetPassword buffer overflow
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in D-Link DIR-605L 2.13B01 BETA and classified as critical. Affected by this vulnerability is the function formSetPassword of the file /goform/formSetPassword. The manipulation of the argument curTime leads to buffer overflow. The attack can be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.

item.title: CVE-2024-9564 | D-Link DIR-605L formWlanWizardSetup buffer overflow
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in D-Link DIR-605L 2.13B01 BETA. Affected is the function formWlanWizardSetup of the file /goform/formWlanWizardSetup. The manipulation of the argument webpage leads to buffer overflow. It is possible to launch the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.
